output:
When I'm sleeping I can see your shadow I can feel gentle intimacy
Your intimacy And every time I wait for night to see you
Once again in my perfect dream In my perfect dream
Every night I wake up to find I wake up and cry
Every night I wake up to find Your shadow lingers inside
So I'm alive and my breath's full of air And I love all my feelings anywhere, anywhere
But the day is over, see the sweat on the moon And my head starts to drop like a roll of cotton
Every night I wake up to find I wake up and cry
Every night I wake up to find Your shadow in deep, deep inside
Every night I wake up to find I wake up and cry, I cry
Every night I wake up to find I wake up and lie, I lie
Every night I wake up to find I wake up and cry, I cry
Every night I wake up to find I wake up and cry, I cry
Every night I wake up to find I wake up and cry, I cry
Every night I wake up to find Your shadow in deep, deep inside
Every night I wake up to find I wake up and cry, I cry
Every night I wake up to find I wake up and lie, I lie
You are in my mind
Inside, inside
